version_description:
It's samba time -- with 24 new levels and new power-ups! Angry Birds Rio now has Sling Scope laser targeting and Super Seeds to supersize your birds, PLUS never-before-seen power-ups: Samba Burst and TNT Drop!

Collect stars to unlock 18 special Sta

It's Market Mayhem! The marmosets are running amok in the market, and it's up to you to stop them! Bounce off awnings and pulverize fruit while you knock those monkeys off their perch!

Samba through 36 NEW LEVELS!

Explore an all new episode!
Based on your feedback, we reduced the number of notifications in Angry Birds Rio. Thanks for playing!

It's SUMMER! Time to relax at the beach with a new Angry Birds Rio episode!

Enjoy the sunset in 15 new beach levels!

Unlock bonus levels by collecting all the golden cherries!

Fun surprises including floating pig balloons and inflatab

FREE FULL GAME – DOWNLOAD NOW!

Celebrate the New Year with 26 Rocket Rumble levels! The party’s starting but those mischievous monkeys keep getting in the way!

NEW LEVELS! Play 20 amazing new levels and unlock 6 special bonus levels!

Make a BIG splash in the High Dive episode – based on the new blockbuster movie sequel Rio 2!

NEW LEVELS! 20 levels and 6 bonus levels set in a Brazilian port harbor!

RIO NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD! Totally refreshed with shiny new graphics for th

- The Angry Birds pursue the dastardly smugglers to a brand new location!
- Fifteen challenging levels will test your puzzle skills!
- Search out all the hidden fruit and earn special awards!
- The Mighty Eagle is now available to wreak havoc on

Jump on a riverboat for a crazy cruise in the Blossom River episode – based on the new blockbuster movie sequel Rio 2!

NEW LEVELS! Play 20 beautiful new levels and discover 6 hidden bonus levels – all set along the incredible Blossom River!
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

It’s the all-new TIMBER TUMBLE episode! Those mischievous monkeys have got their hands on some logging equipment – get ready to shout TIMBER!

NEW LEVELS! 20 exotic new levels and six bonus ones!

CALL THE FLOCK! Get some demolition help from
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

Are you the champion of Angry Birds Rio? We've got a special treat for you! Open 12 amazing new bonus levels through in-game achievements!

Unlock the bonus levels for an episode by finishing all the levels or collecting all the fruit in that episod
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

Now you can earn coins by getting two or three stars in levels!
- Use coins to unlock bonus levels and buy awesome power-ups!
- Earn new daily rewards – come back every day for more!

Float along the Amazon river and dive into the jungle
in the new TREASURE HUNT episode! 20 feather-
ruffling levels full of new challenges and new
collectible coins!

NEW EPISODE: 20 new levels with more on the way!

COLLECTIBLE COI

The Treasure Hunt continues in 20 more levels brimming with gold – but The REAL TREASURE awaits at the end of the journey. Collect all coins to uncover the motherload!

20 new Treasure Hunt levels
6 new bonus levels
Minor improvements
We popped some pesky bugs! Slinging should be even smoother, now!
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!
